00069 #define ZIP_AES_MAC_SIZE 10
00070 
00071 
00080 class ZIP_API CZipAesCryptograph : public CZipCryptograph
00081 {
00082  // TODO: make it multithreading safe
00083  static CRandomPool m_pool;
00084 public:
00085 
00096  CZipAesCryptograph(int iStrength)
00097  {
00098   if (iStrength < CZipCryptograph::encWinZipAes128 || iStrength > CZipCryptograph::encWinZipAes256)
00099    CZipException::Throw(CZipException::generic);
00100   m_iStrength = iStrength;
00101   m_pAes = NULL;
00102  }
00103 
00104 #ifdef _ZIP_DOC_GENERATION
00105  bool InitDecode(CZipAutoBuffer& password, CZipFileHeader& currentFile, CZipStorage& storage);
00106  void FinishDecode(CZipFileHeader& currentFile, CZipStorage& storage);
00107 #else
00108  bool InitDecode(CZipAutoBuffer& password, CZipFileHeader&, CZipStorage& storage);
00109  void FinishDecode(CZipFileHeader&, CZipStorage& storage);
00110 #endif
00111  void InitEncode(CZipAutoBuffer& password, CZipFileHeader& currentFile, CZipStorage& storage);
00112  void FinishEncode(CZipFileHeader& currentFile, CZipStorage& storage);
00113  
00114  
00115  void Decode(char* pBuffer, DWORD uSize)
00116  {  
00117   if (!m_pAes)
00118   {
00119    ASSERT(FALSE);
00120    return;
00121   }  
00122   m_hmac.Data(pBuffer, uSize);
00123   m_pAes->Encrypt(pBuffer, uSize);
00124  }
00125 
00126  void Encode(char* pBuffer, DWORD uSize)
00127  {
00128   if (!m_pAes)
00129   {
00130    ASSERT(FALSE);
00131    return;
00132   }
00133   m_pAes->Encrypt(pBuffer, uSize);
00134   m_hmac.Data(pBuffer, uSize);
00135  }
00136 
00137  static DWORD GetEncryptedInfoSize(int iStrength);
00138  static int GetKeySize(int iStrength);
00139 
00155  static void DeriveKey(const CZipAutoBuffer& password, const CZipAutoBuffer& salt, UINT iIterations, CZipAutoBuffer& key);
00156 private:
00157  static int GetSaltSize(int iStrength);
00158  void Init(const CZipAutoBuffer& password, const CZipAutoBuffer& salt, CZipAutoBuffer& verifier);
00159  void Finish(CZipAutoBuffer& mac)
00160  {
00161   mac.Allocate(ZIP_AES_MAC_SIZE, true);
00162   m_hmac.End(mac, ZIP_AES_MAC_SIZE);
00163  }
00164  void ClearAes()
00165  {
00166   if (m_pAes != NULL)
00167   {
00168    delete m_pAes;
00169    m_pAes = NULL;
00170   }
00171  }
00172  CAes* m_pAes;
00173  int m_iStrength;
00174  CHmac m_hmac;
00175 public:
00176  ~CZipAesCryptograph()
00177  {
00178   ClearAes();
00179  }
00180 };
